data.title: Elton Brand Player Profile, Philadelphia Sixers
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Elton Brand on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 30, 1999 - The Chicago Bulls selected Elton Brand in Round 1 with Pick 1 in the 1999 NBA Draft. Jul 26, 1999 - Elton Brand signed a multi-year contract with the Chicago Bulls. Jun 27, 2001 - Elton Brand was acquired by the Los Angeles Clippers from the Chicago Bulls in exchange for Brian Skinner and the draft rights to Tyson Chandler. Oct 1, 2001 - The Los Angeles Clippers exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Elton Brand. Jun 25, 2003 - The Los Angeles Clippers tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Elton Brand a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2003 - Elton Brand, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 16, 2003 - Elton Brand signed a multi-year offer sheet with the Miami Heat. Since he is a restricted free agent, the Los Angeles Clippers can match. Jul 19, 2003 - The Los Angeles Clippers matched the offer sheet that Elton Brand signed with the Miami Heat. Jul 21, 2003 - Elton Brand signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Jun 30, 2008 - Elton Brand exercised an Early Termination Option to void the remaining seasons on his contract. Jul 1, 2008 - Elton Brand, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2008 - Elton Brand signed a multi-year contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Jul 11, 2012 - The Philadelphia Sixers utilized the amnesty provision on the contract of Elton Brand. Jul 13, 2012 - Elton Brand, previously with the Philadelphia Sixers, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2012 - The Dallas Mavericks made a successful amnesty waiver claim for the contract of Elton Brand. Jul 1, 2013 - Elton Brand, previously with the Dallas Mavericks, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2013 - The Dallas Mavericks renounced their free-agent exception rights to Elton Brand. Jul 15, 2013 - Elton Brand signed a contract with the Atlanta Hawks. Jul 1, 2014 - Elton Brand, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Sep 10, 2014 - Elton Brand signed a contract with the Atlanta Hawks. Jul 1, 2015 - Elton Brand, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2015 - The Atlanta Hawks renounced their free-agent exception rights to Elton Brand. Jan 4, 2016 - Elton Brand signed a contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Jul 1, 2016 - Elton Brand, previously with the Philadelphia Sixers, became a free agent. Sep 7, 2016 - Elton Brand signed a contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Oct 22, 2016 - The Philadelphia Sixers placed the contract of Elton Brand on waivers.
